history.text: The Tribal Council reviewed comments received on the posting. Proposed revisions were posted for additional comment on January 19, 2016. On March 15, 2016, the Tribal Council, by Resolution No. 038-16, repealed the existing Chapter TCT.02 and replaced it with the new Civil Procedure Ordinance. The ordinance was approved by the BIA on August 3, 2017.

annotations.annotation: On March 17, 2015, the Tribal Council posted a new Civil Procedure Ordinance for comment. This document repealed and replaced Chapter TCT.02, Administrative Appeals, with a new ordinance addressing civil procedures for practice before the Stockbridge-Munsee Tribal Court System. It included provisions addressing civil procedures that had previously been addressed in Chapter TCT.01, new rules of procedure, as well as procedures relating to administrative appeals.
